name: PrimeVault
headline: Supercharged crypto operations, custody and risk management
description: PrimeVault is a deep-tech crypto infrastructure company that is dedicated to building innovative core tools that make on-chain value ownership, transfer, issuance and access to decentralized financial products convenient, efficient and secure for businesses and institutions of any size and scale. PrimeVault leverages cutting-edge technologies such as sealed TEEs (Trusted Execution Environment), Formal Verification and MPC (Multiparty Computation) to offer powerful, secure, scalable and modular wallet infrastructure, programmable cross-chain asset management, comprehensive portfolio tracker, seamless CeDeFi interoperability with both on- and off-chain markets, and sophisticated risk mitigation solutions.
tags: industry:defi; industry:saas; industry:crypto-web3; industry:b2b; industry:dao; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Prashant Upadhyay, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder @ PrimeVault - an all-in-one crypto security platform for teams to manage their digital assets, DeFi investments and more. Formerly, first PM at Rippling (YC W17) building and scaling payroll, payments, compliance, risk and accounting products. Math nerd, Web3 enthusiast.

founders.name: Tanmay Chaudhari, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of PrimeVault. Previously a tech lead at Rippling and worked at Goldman Sachs.

founders.name: Vivek Kumar, Co-Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder @ PrimeVault,
Former Tech lead at Rippling

raw_markdown='![header-background](https://www.primevault.com/images/header-background.svg)
[![primevault](https://www.primevault.com/images/primevault.svg)](https://www.primevault.com/<https:/www.primevault.com>)
Book a demo
Next-gen custody, trading and risk infrastructure for institutional CeDeFi and enterprise digital asset operations
Supercharge your crypto operations with powerful and secure on-chain automations, direct access to the largest on- and off-chain markets, and enterprise-grade risk mitigation and compliance tools
Book a demo
![Mobile-And-WebApp-Dashboard](https://www.primevault.com/images/Mobile-And-WebApp-Dashboard.png)
Built for enterprise scale and security
Custody
Institutional self custody, revolutionized
Trade
High performance hybrid trading infrastructure
Risk Management
Continuous risk monitoring and mitigation
Web3 Treasury & Tokenization
Token issuance, vesting, distribution and payments
Build with PrimeVault
API and flexible deployments
New paradigm in self custody with zero counterparty risk
Proprietary MPC-powered transaction signing with a decentralized blockchain co-signer
Fine-grained custody governance rules and access controls trustlessly enforced by private smart contracts on-chain (“Vault Contracts”)
Industry-leading key protection with multi-TEE setup for hardware-level private key isolation
Robust, geographically distributed MPC node clusters for high performance and fault tolerance
Multi-chain, multi-asset, multi-protocol support, including custom assets
Use permissioned vaults to securely manage trading activity on external venues like exchanges
Enterprise-grade secure key backup and recovery: both self- and 3rd party-managed
![custody-with-configurable-policies](https://www.primevault.com/images/Custody-With-Configurable-Policies.png)
Institutions
Funds, Market Makers, Exchanges, Prop Traders
![Institutions](https://www.primevault.com/images/operational_risk.png)
Increase efficiency and minimize operational risk through single window access to your entire portfolio
![Institutions](https://www.primevault.com/images/defi.png)
Make the most of your assets through seamless access to new DeFi opportunities
![Institutions](https://www.primevault.com/images/automations.png)
Maximize your productivity by eliminating manual interventions and automating on-chain transactions
![Institutions](https://www.primevault.com/images/risk_automations.png)
Sleep at peace with automated risk management protecting you from any shocks in prices of your assets
![Institutions](https://www.primevault.com/images/trading_strategies.png)
Reduce lead time for implementing new trading strategies and save developer hours
![Institutions](https://www.primevault.com/images/access_control.png)
Minimize your overall exposure and reduce operational risk by setting granular policies for access controls and system governance across your team members
Web3 Treasuries
Token issuance, vesting, distribution and payments
![Restrict](https://www.primevault.com/images/token_operations.png)
Fulfil all your token operations - minting, burning, vesting, distribution, and more - from one solution and reduce costs on multiple products and in-house development
![Restrict](https://www.primevault.com/images/governance.png)
Restrict your exposure to both internal and external actors by setting granular access controls and system governance across your organization
![Restrict](https://www.primevault.com/images/automate_treasury.png)
Automate treasury operations such as payroll, liquidity management in DeFi etc., and focus your developer time on your customer-facing product and eliminate effort on internal solutions
![Restrict](https://www.primevault.com/images/trade_assets.png)
Seamlessly trade assets with best price executions from within PrimeVault
![Restrict](https://www.primevault.com/images/compliance.png)
Save time and effort required for taxes and compliance by generating detailed reporting of assets across self custody vaults, DeFi and exchanges
Explore the frontiers of DeFi with secure on-chain automations 
Secure your DeFi advantage with our generalized non-custodial wallet automations
Pre-authorize on-chain transfers, trades and risk strategies that run autonomously when configured conditions are satisfied via PrimeVault’s Autonomous Signing Infrastructure (ASI)
Decentralized MPC node clusters that execute pre-authorized transactions with minimal trust requirements
Natively DeFi experience that rivals CeFi and centralized exchanges
![explore](https://www.primevault.com/images/explore.png)
Industry-leading security and privacy
![halborn](https://www.primevault.com/images/halborn-logo.svg)
Audited by Halborn
![soc2](https://www.primevault.com/images/soc2.png)
SOC 2 certified
Backed by

generated_description:
**PrimeVault: Supercharging Crypto Operations**

Founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, PrimeVault is a deep-tech crypto infrastructure company dedicated to enhancing the world of decentralized finance (DeFi) through innovative tools. As part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, it leverages advanced technologies like Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs), Formal Verification, and Multiparty Computation (MPC) to redefine how businesses and institutions manage their digital assets securely and efficiently.

**Mission and Services**
PrimeVault's mission is clear: to supercharge crypto operations. They focus on providing a comprehensive suite of services that encompass custody, trading, risk management, and a seamless interface for entering the DeFi space. Their offerings include:

- **Custody:** Revolutionizing institutional self-custody with fine-grained governance and multi-TEE key protection.
- **Trade:** High-performance trading infrastructure enabling access to both on- and off-chain markets.
- **Risk Management:** Continuous monitoring and mitigation strategies that protect users from market volatility.
- **Web3 Treasury & Tokenization:** Streamlining token operations like issuance and compliance, all under one roof.

The goal is to create a modular, scalable infrastructure that provides businesses, funds, market makers, and exchanges with tools that ease the complexity often associated with crypto and DeFi operations.

**Innovative Features**
PrimeVault boasts several notable innovations:
- A **proprietary MPC-powered transaction signing** mechanism that ensures top-tier security.
- Comprehensive multi-chain and multi-asset protocol support, allowing for versatile asset management.
- Automated on-chain transactions that reduce manual input and operational risk.

Through their Autonomous Signing Infrastructure (ASI), users can pre-authorize transactions that execute once predefined conditions are met, further automating and securing their crypto operations.

**Team and Leadership**
PrimeVault, despite being a small team of just three employees, benefits from significant industry insights and mentorship, particularly from Group Partner Harj Taggar at Y Combinator. Their compact size allows them to maintain agility while addressing the intricate needs of their users.

**Backed and Audited**
With backing from prominent players like Arrington Capital and Hashkey Capital, PrimeVault holds an industry-leading position not just in technology but also in trust. They’ve achieved SOC 2 certification and undergone audits by Halborn—this highlights their commitment to security and privacy in the crypto space.

**Why Choose PrimeVault?**
For institutions looking to navigate the complex landscape of digital assets with efficiency and confidence, PrimeVault offers a promising pathway. It represents the evolution of digital asset management where security and operational ease meet cutting-edge technology.

Interested parties can explore collaborations or demo their offerings at [PrimeVault's website](https://www.primevault.com).

In summary, PrimeVault isn't just about crypto; it's about empowering businesses to harness the full potential of digital assets with robust, secure, and innovative solutions. They’re paving the way for a decentralized future—one smart contract at a time.
